LanguageData.AutoRefuelDesc: Toggles automatic refueling. When enabled, fuel will be automatically replenished from stockpiles according to the set fuel level.
LanguageData.AutoRefuelLevelDesc: Sets the fuel level at which fuel will be automatically replenished from stockpiles.
LanguageData.AutoRefueledFullMsg: Automatically refueled the shuttle with {0} units of fuel from stockpiles, reached the target fuel level of {1}.
LanguageData.AutoRefueledMsg: Automatically refueled the shuttle with {0} units of fuel from stockpiles, but stockpiles are insufficient to reach the target fuel level of {1}.
LanguageData.EmgTradeDesc: Call for an emergency fuel trade with a nearby settlement. The fuel will be delivered directly to your caravan.
LanguageData.EmgTradeDisabledReason: There is still sufficient fuel in the current caravan or shuttle.
LanguageData.NoNegotiatorNotice: Cannot complete: there is no colonist in the shuttle or caravan capable of negotiating trades.
LanguageData.SendNewEmgChemfuelTrader: Call fuel trader from another settlement
LanguageData.CurrentFuelTradersListNotice: Fuel traders are currently available from the following settlements:
